title: 115_hr1759
content: Traveling Exotic Animal and Public Safety Protection Act This bill amends the Animal Welfare Act to establish a prohibition on the use of exotic or wild animals in performances of a traveling animal act. The prohibition does not apply to the use of animals in: (1) zoos, (2) aquariums, (3) research facilities. (4) film, television, or advertising, if the performance is not before a public studio audience. Or (5) rodeos. The prohibition also does not apply to domestic animals or farm animals.
